entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intermitent crash when navigating to a page containing images #9011
    6.0-servicing
  • Allow layout manager replacement for existing layout types #9010
    .NET 7
  • [Android] Bad z-index for item in a grid #9009
  • [Android] RefreshView doesn't size itself correctly #9008
  • Java.Lang.RuntimeException: 'Canvas: trying to use a recycled bitmap android.graphics.Bitmap@3fd875' #9007
  • Include support for high-Speed Bluetooth Printing and QrCode Scanning in MAUI for POS systems #9006
  • [Android] DisplayAlert accept and cancel action color in light and dark theme #9005
  • NavigationPageRenderer bug on Android #9003
  • [Android] Editor not displaying text correctly #9002
  • ScrollView‘s HorizontalScrollBar is not visible and ScrollView cannot scroll horizontally #9000
  • "Switch" ui control: global style ignored on Android #8998
  • [Windows] Faced no installed components were detected exception #8997

Closed

  • [IOS] #6574 REGRESSION InputTransparency always cascades to Children even when CascadeInputTransparent= false #8725
  • Can't publish BlazorWinFormsApp or BlazorWpfApp BlazorWebView samples with ClickOnce #8967
    7.0-rc1
  • Move Maui.Graphics into the main .NET MAUI repository #7901
    6.0-servicing
  • Spelling Mistake in FlexLayout AlignContent options. #8966
  • CaptureVideoAsync always returning null when using Windows Machine #7616
  • MediaPicker not working on Windows #7465
  • MAUI Essentials MediaPicker CapturePhotoAsync on Windows distinguish between no camera and cancelled #6660

PullRequests

Created

  • ToDateTimeOffset #9017
  • Use $(_MauiDotNetTfm) instead of hardcoded net6.0 #9016
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Dev/graphics net7 #9015

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22369.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22373.2 #8982
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.4.2.1 to 2.5.0 #8977
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Merge Maui.Graphics into Maui! (net7.0 / main) #8739
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker TextColor property #7995
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr3
  • Make CalendarDatePickerExtensions.ToDateFormat internal until .NET 7 #8930
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8995
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix typo "SpaceAroun" in FlexEnumDesignTypeConverters #8983

Updated

  • [xamlc] add compiled StrokeShapeTypeConverter #8849
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.4.1.2 to 2.5.0 #8981
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, area/infrastructure 🏗️, control-dualscreen, 6.0-servicing
  • Build maui.aar on CI #8943
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix Button appearance on Catalyst using UIDeviceFamily 6 #7841
    t/bug, do-not-merge, area/desktop 🖥️, control-button, 6.0-sr3
